name: @codecapsule/lambda-executor
description: AWS Lambda container for heavy language execution (Java, C++, C)

scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_ACCOUNT.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com && docker build -t piston-executor . && docker tag piston-executor:latest $AWS_ACCOUNT.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/piston-executor:latest && docker push $AWS_ACCOUNT.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/piston-executor:latest
